headline: Is Roper Technologies (ROP) Now Undervalued After Its Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: Recent performance puts Roper Technologies (ROP) under the microscope Roper Technologies (ROP) has slipped about 16% over the past 3 months and roughly 22% over the past year, putting a spotlight on how its fundamentals stack up against that pullback. See our latest analysis for Roper Technologies. At around $444 per share, Roper’s slide has been more of a slow reset than a crash. A 1 year total shareholder return of about negative 22% contrasts with a modestly positive 3 year total...
